# Government Tender Announcement

## Title

Construction and Installation of an Externally Accessible Non-Rusting Stairwell for Prairie and Northern Wildlife Research Centre (PNWRC) Building

## Solicitation Number

5000062579

## Contracting Entity

Environment Canada

## Description

Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires the installation of an outside non-rusting stairwell at the Prairie and Northern Wildlife Research Centre (PNWRC) building located at 115 Perimeter Rd., Saskatoon, SK S7N 0X4. The new stairwell will enhance safety standards and provide an improved code-compliant access route to the building's roof.

## Important Details

* **GSIN Number**: 5169D
* **Solicitation Type**: [Request for Proposal](#section-tradetype)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regional Opportunities**: Canada (with a focus on Saskatchewan)
* **Language of Tender**: Both official languages (English and French)
* **Publication Date**: August 23, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 20, 2022, at 15:00 (MST)

## How to Participate

To submit a bid, follow these instructions:

1. Download the Request for Proposal documents from [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/23/887dec7f4c3919d14f8dcebbb8af7f4b/21-715_pnwrc_en.pdf).
2. Register your company in the Government Electronic Tendering System ([GES](https://btsShopping.ca/suppliers)) and log in.
3. Complete and submit your bid electronically in the GES system.
4. Send a copy of your bid to the Contracting Officer identified in this Notice.

Additional information is available by contacting:

* Alyssa Festeryga, Contracting Officer
* Phone: (123) 456-7890
* Email: [alyssa.festeryga@ec.gc.ca](mailto:alyssa.festeryga@ec.gc.ca)
* Address: 45 Alderney Drive, Dartmouth, NS B2Y 2N6

## Security and Exigences

Please note that there are security requirements and measures associated with this project.

By following the steps above, you can participate and submit a bid for this tender opportunity.
